title: Formative Assessment Learning Strategy Development Based on Mobile Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Digital Literacy and Experience with Mobile Device Usage
context.additional_context: Integrates mobile technology into language learning (medical terminology, legal documents, technical manuals, etc.) for students exploring careers in healthcare, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and summarize language materials required in real workplace contexts with 80% accuracy using mobile devices.
Learners can diagnose individual cognitive load levels based on formative assessment feedback and revise learning strategies three or more times.
Learners can apply and explain learned language concepts in offline role-playing scenarios at over 70% proficiency through digital-real world interactions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
